verb_tenses.name: Future Perfect Continuous
verb_tenses.example: I will have been drinking coffee

pronouns.name: Relative
pronouns.example: The coffee which I bought is delicious

sentence_structures.name: Compound sentences
sentence_structures.example: I like coffee, but I don't like tea.

sentence_structures.name: Complex sentences
sentence_structures.example: Although I like coffee, I try to limit my intake.

sentence_structures.name: Compound-complex sentences
sentence_structures.example: I like coffee, and I drink it often, but when I have too much, I get jittery.

clauses.name: Relative clauses
clauses.example: The coffee that I bought is delicious

clauses.name: Noun clauses
clauses.example: What I want is a cup of coffee

clauses.name: Adverbial clauses
clauses.example: When I wake up, I drink coffee

phrases.name: Gerund phrases
phrases.example: Drinking coffee is my morning ritual

phrases.name: Participial phrases
phrases.example: Sipping coffee, I read the newspaper

mood.name: Subjunctive
mood.example: If I were you, I would drink coffee

conditionals.name: Zero conditional
conditionals.example: If you heat water, it boils

conditionals.name: First conditional
conditionals.example: If it rains, I'll have coffee inside

conditionals.name: Second conditional
conditionals.example: If I had coffee, I would drink it

conditionals.name: Third conditional
conditionals.example: If I had known you were coming, I would have made coffee

conditionals.name: Mixed conditionals
conditionals.example: If I liked coffee, I would have ordered some

reported_speech.name: Indirect speech
reported_speech.example: She said that she loved coffee

questions.name: Wh- questions
questions.example: Where did you buy this coffee?

modals.name: Possibility
modals.example: It might be too late for coffee

quantifiers.name: Quantifiers
quantifiers.example: Much coffee, many cups, a lot of beans, few sips, little cream, some sugar, any milk

conjunctions.name: Subordinating
conjunctions.example: I drink coffee because I like it

conjunctions.name: Correlative
conjunctions.example: Either you drink coffee or you don't

prepositions.name: Place prepositions
prepositions.example: at the cafe, in the mug

prepositions.name: Direction prepositions
prepositions.example: into the cup, through the filter
